Title: Atheme IRC Services: Denial of service
Synopsis:
A vulnerability has been found in Atheme which may lead to Denial
    of Service or a bypass of security restrictions.

Background.Text: Atheme is a portable and secure set of open-source and modular IRC services. CertFP is certificate fingerprinting used to authenticate users to nicknames.

Description.Text: The “myuser_delete()” function in account.c does not properly remove CertFP entries when deleting user accounts.

Impact.Text: A remote authenticated attacker may be able to cause a Denial of Service condition or gain access to an Atheme IRC Services user account.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All Atheme users should upgrade to the latest version:
